channel.title: Portfolios on Tatsuya Kaneko
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Tatsuya Kaneko

item.title: Tiqets: App Clip on Apple Map
item.description: App Clip directly integrated on Apple Map. Available for Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam, Sagrada Familia in Barcelona, MoMA in New York, and more!

item.title: SyncVR Medical: VR headset controller on iPad
item.description: SyncVR is a company that develops VR applications used in medical contexts. I have built an iOS app allows nurses to remote control the VR headset to guide the patient in VR.

item.title: Sense Labs: React Native bridge for iOS Health Kit
item.description: React Native SDK for iOS Health Kit. It enabled React Native apps to subscribe Health Kit data updates.

item.title: Tiqets: Filterable Map
item.description: Filterable items on map component. A common iOS UI pattern that can be found in many apps.

item.title: Tiqets: Magical Tickets Fetch
item.description: Tickets are automatically available right after installation. It’s magic!

item.title: Network Demo with Swift UI and MVVM
item.description: An app to demostrate how network calls can be implemented in a SwiftUI/MVVM app.
